overview: Fan Service [bitter] is Perfume's first concert DVD. It was filmed December 21, 2006 at Harajuku Astro Hall.  Tracklist  Electro World  Oishii Recipe  Computer City  MC  Linear Motor Girl  Monochrome Effect  Super Jet Shoes ~Mirai wo Aruku Kutsu~  MC  Perfume Medley  OMAJINAI★Perori  Vitamin Drop  Imitation World  Counter Attraction  Kareshi Boshuuchuu  Jenny wa Gokigen Naname  OMAJINAI★Perori  Perfect Star Perfect Style  Computer Driving  Sweet Donuts  Perfume  ~encore~  MC  Twinkle Snow Powdery Snow  wonder2
title: Perfume - Fan Service -bitter-
